item.description:
Join the WHY community for their special annual Winter Solstice kirtan where they close out the year and prepare for the next with an ancient fire ceremony called a homa hotra. In preparation, participants are invited to create a Shiv Resolve, an intention whereby you list out on seperate sheets what you need to let go of from the past and what you wish to bring in for your future. You will release Resolves into the fire as part of the ceremony.

$15 suggested donation

http://www.westhartfordyoga.com/events.htm
item.name: Winter Solstice Kirtan with Shankara and Friends
